title: Understanding Amortization
text: An amortization schedule is a detailed table that outlines each periodic payment on a loan. It helps you understand how much of each payment goes towards the principal and how much goes towards interest.

title: Components of an Amortization Schedule
text: The schedule includes the beginning and ending balance of the loan, the amount of each payment, and how much of each payment is applied to the principal and interest.

hintAnswer: it shows the beginning and ending of a loan, the amount of payment applied to the principal, and interest in each payment period
title: Identifying the Correct Definition
text: Which of the following best describes an amortization schedule?
choices: it shows the beginning and ending of a loan, the amount of payment applied to the principal, and interest in each payment period
it shows interests of all kinds
it divides up loans into different types
